titleStmt.title: R A Bullington et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG6571

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: To his Excellency Thos E Bramlette Governor of the state of Kentucky

Your Petitioners would Respectfully state to you that at the December Term 1864 of the Metcalfe Cirucit Court there was Judgment Rendered against Edmund R Nance for the sum of Twenty five dollars & the cost of the action of the Comwth vs Nance E R Nance for trespass & injury to Property. Now we state that the said nance is an honest & hardworking but very poor man. with six small children to suport. & that paying the said fine of $2500, will seriously interfere with his doing Justice to his helpless family. we mention the facts to your Excellency hoping that you may exercise the power vested in you by & Relieve the said nance of said fine
Edmonton June 15" 1865

R A Bullington
B S Coleman
J.. B.. Coleman
Curt W Coleman
J M Salmon
Charels Yates
D. J. Bullington
J H Phillips
E. C. Murray
J. W. Compton
R H Young
John Y Wallace
Tho E Young
Andrew Beard
James D. Salmon
John U Young
S. S. Murray
Buck Mitchel
P S Rush
R C Bullington
Robert W Scott
A B Scott
R P Wren
S W Scott
A. J. Cox

Metcalfe Cir Ct
vs
E. R. Nance
$25
